page.title: 07Our Junior School's Sport
page.content:
On Tuesday 16th July 1985 St. Mary's held their Sports Day on Eccles' Recreation Ground. The first event was the 50m. This was followed by the 80m and the 100m. All these races were run on the straight. By this time Sherwin Team was in first place with 45 pts. The next event was the 200m which was one lap around the track. Then it was time for the boys' 800m followed by the girls' 800m. Sherwin won both races. Then it was time for the three-legged race, followed by the sack race and the obstacle race. This was the most amusing race of all. The final race (which could have altered the points a lot) was the relay race.
The final places were: Sherwin 1st, Barlow 2nd, Arrowsmith 3rd and Southworth 4th.
